Title: There and Back
Writer: Pawel Mossakowski (screenwriter), Anna Swierkocka, Maciej Swierkocki, Wojciech WÃ³jcik (idea)
Actors: Janusz Gajos, Jan Frycz, Olaf Lubaszenko, Miroslaw Baka
Plot: In the mid-1960s, a respected surgeon dreams of leaving Poland to see his wife and daughter in England. To get the money for his escape, he needs to consider taking part in a bank robbery.
